faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about using our yellow screen tool for various purposes.

questions.question: What is a Yellow Screen tool used for?
questions.answer: A Yellow Screen tool displays a yellow color in fullscreen mode, commonly used for screen testing, mood boards, eye comfort, content creation, and enhancing visual creativity.

questions.question: How do I use Yellow Screen for eye comfort?
questions.answer: The Yellow Screen reduces blue light exposure, making it easier on your eyes during night-time browsing or long working hours. It helps reduce eye strain and improve visual comfort.

questions.question: Can I use Yellow Screen for content creation?
questions.answer: Yes! The Yellow Screen is perfect for creating warm, inviting backgrounds for online content, virtual classes, or live streams. It adds energy and positivity to your content.

questions.question: Why use Yellow Screen for screen testing?
questions.answer: Yellow is an excellent color for testing display accuracy and color calibration. It helps identify color issues and fine-tune monitor settings for optimal viewing.

questions.question: Is Yellow Screen good for creativity?
questions.answer: Yes, yellow is associated with creativity and optimism. A Yellow Screen can inspire creative thinking and serve as a mood board for design projects and artistic work.
